Posts.Content: My wife took Afinitor/Anastrozole for two months with no response... but she was a refractory case.  Only minimal side effects... 1 mouth sore and dry lips.  Good luck with your battle.
Posts.Title: New med AFINTOR

Posts.Content: My wife experienced the same thing.  Unfortunately, it just takes time to heal itself... just remember that you had a major surgery with a lot of muscle tissue involved.  I personally think that you made a wise decision... good luck and may God bless you with a speedy recovery!
Posts.Title: masectomy and expanders
